attributes.action: A second Scottish independence referendum due to the EU referendum results
attributes.background: Despite every Scottish council voting to remain in the EU, we are being forced to leave. It is time for a second referendum, so finally the voices of the Scottish people can be heard and we can make the best decisions for our country.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/132667
